sentences.en: A newer anti-HIV drug called pyridinone caused HIV to mutate into a form which could not reproduce or infect new cells.
sentences.cn: 一种叫作吡啶酮的新型抗艾滋病药物能促使艾滋病毒变异，使其不能繁殖，也不会再感染新的细胞。

sentences.en: A single mosquito can infect a large number of people.
sentences.cn: 一只蚊子就可以感染很多人。

sentences.en: Airborne spores infect freshly exposed wood.
sentences.cn: 存在于空气中的孢子,侵染新长出来的林木.

sentences.en: Go away, I don't want to infect you with my cold.
sentences.cn: 躲开, 我不愿意把感冒传染给你.

sentences.en: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.cn: 他认为他们可以用他们的资产阶级思想去影响别人。

sentences.en: His urge for revenge would never infect her.
sentences.cn: 他的强烈复仇渴望永远不会影响到她。

sentences.en: I didn't pay any attention to it because I never infect.
sentences.cn: 我对这事毫不注意,因为我从来未受感染.

sentences.en: I was been aureate by this to infect in autumn. infatuating with.
sentences.cn: 我被这金色的秋天感染了. 陶醉了. 啊!

sentences.en: It is not possible to infect another person through kissing.
sentences.cn: 接吻不可能把这种病传染给他人。

sentences.en: Let her not infect the whole flock.
sentences.cn: 绝不能让她带坏一帮子人.

sentences.en: Lucy’s enthusiasm soon infected the rest of the class.
sentences.cn: 露西的热情很快就感染了班里的其他人。

sentences.en: People with the virus may feel perfectly well, but they can still infect others.
sentences.cn: 带有这种病毒的人可能毫无症状，却仍可能传染他人。

sentences.en: The microscopic worms infect snails , which in turn lay infected eggs.
sentences.cn: 显微镜下的蠕虫传染蜗牛, 产下受传染的蛋.

sentences.en: They think of viruses that infect an organization from the outside. They envision hackers breaking into their information vaults.
sentences.cn: 他们考虑来自外部的感染公司的病毒, 他们设想黑客侵入到信息宝库中.

sentences.en: What symptom does syphilis have? Through what to infect?
sentences.cn: 梅毒有哪些症状? 都是通过什么传染的?

sentences.en: When you have measles, you must stay at home or you will infect the class.
sentences.cn: 你如果得了麻疹就必须呆在家里,否则会传染全班同学.

words.tran_cn: 传染的；传染性的；易传染的
有传染性的，感染别人的

trans.tran_cn: 传染，使感染（计算机病毒/情感），影响
传染， 感染； 影响， 使受影响
